title: Cross Road
description: High school students Miho and Shouta are preparing for college entrance examinations. Miho comes from an island without even one cram school, while Shouta lives in Tokyo and works a part-time job. Both are striving to pass exams so they can enter college. The pair enroll in Z-Kai's correspondence education courses, and their lives cross before they realize it.
genre: [<Genre -> Comedy>, <Genre -> School>, <Genre -> Seinen>, <Genre -> Slice of Life>]
